caption:
@ShawnMendes ? HAPPY BIRTHDAY ?? to this beautiful, fun, spirited beautiful-eyed boy,  the beautiful, the wonderful Shawn Peter Raul Mendes!!! ?❤️ The last one to turn 17! Wow I can't believe it
Crazy how time flies. ?
My  little ShawnyBear not so little anymore cause you're 17 what the heck. Why are we growing up this is weird?! ?

I'm so thankful that you are in my life. You're such a beautiful human being inside and out. :')❤️

Thanks for being such a lovely human being,  and always taking your time to make people feel loved and reminded of it. You truly have a special spirit. ?
You have a heart of gold ? You make so many people smile ? 
I love your passion and admire how you speak what your heart says ❤️
I love how you laugh at the cutest things,? that smile could light up the entire earth.❤️
Your insanely amazing talent shines so bright just like your smile ✨❤️

Thank you for your kind heart and your ability to make me smile and laugh when it's the last thing I can fathom doing.?
You are such an incredible friend to me and everyone around you and for that I hope you know you are greatly loved. ALSO can we talk about that VOICE OF AN ANGEL ???? Seriously make me a lullaby CD so you can serenade me all the time ?
I LOVE YOU SO MUCH SHAWNY ❤️
I hope you've had an amazing day in seattle with your family and friends!! ??
Shawn don't ever forget, I am always here for you if you need anything ☺️God bless you always✨?  and happy birthday my cute 17 years old!! ???

BTW Stop being so gorgeous ! Save some for the rest  of guys Lol. ??

Shawn always always here for you, I love you with all of my heart. ?❤️

-Mariana Tafoya ?
